jenkins.plugins.publish__over__ssh.BapSs.execCommand: cd barre-economiste WPDBNAME=`cat wp-config.php | grep 'DB_NAME' | cut -d \' -f 4` WPDBUSER=`cat wp-config.php | grep 'DB_USER' | cut -d \' -f 4` WPDBPASS=`cat wp-config.php | grep 'DB_PASSWORD' | cut -d \' -f 4` WPDBHOST=`cat wp-config.php | grep 'DB_HOST' | cut -d \' -f 4 | cut -d : -f 1` WPDBPORT=`cat wp-config.php | grep 'DB_HOST' | cut -d \' -f 4 | cut -d : -f 2` if [ "$WPDBPORT" == "$WPDBHOST" ]; then echo "Port non prÃ©sent pour le mysqldump" mysqldump -h $WPDBHOST -u $WPDBUSER -p$WPDBPASS $WPDBNAME > export_database.sql else echo "Port prÃ©sent pour le mysqldump" mysqldump -h $WPDBHOST -u $WPDBUSER -p$WPDBPASS $WPDBNAME -P $WPDBPORT > export_database.sql fi git add . -v git commit --author="Timothee Via Jenkins <timotheebarreteau@gmail.com>" -m 'Sauvegarde journaliere' | true

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash cd $HOME/HOME/Barre-Economiste; git fetch site master git reset --hard site/master git push origin master -f WPNAME='Barre_Economiste' WPDBVERSION=`cat wp-includes/version.php | grep "wp_version =" | cut -d \' -f 2` WPPLUGIN=`find wp-content/plugins/ -type d -maxdepth 1 | cut -f3 -d '/'` URL='http://barre-economiste.fr/' TYPE='wordpress' SERV='OVH ALOA.OVH' FAVICON='http://barre-economiste.fr/wp-content/themes/templateBarre/images/barre-economiste-logo.svg' curl http://aloa:Palmier-10@monit.aloa.ovh/RapportsMonitoring/post.php -X POST -d "type=$TYPE&name=$WPNAME&version=$WPDBVERSION&plugin=$WPPLUGIN&url=$URL&serveur=$SERV&favicon=$FAVICON"
declare -u UPPER_LF="Barre-Economiste" mkdir -p $HOME/HOME/_Rapports/$UPPER_LF ~/.timotheeBin/phploc wp-content/themes > $HOME/HOME/_Rapports/$UPPER_LF/rapport_phploc.txt ~/.timotheeBin/phpmetrics wp-content/themes --report-html=$HOME/HOME/_Rapports/$UPPER_LF/rapport_phpmetrics
